name: Deep Smoothie
description:
Description: 

Try to survive getting shredded by a homicidal blender while pondering existential trivia questions - but not for too long, your clock is ticking!

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move left and right, and up to jump.

Contributors: 

Game Design: Celine, Miri, Ronja, Marko, Levi, Jenny, Sanny, Simon

Programming: Ronja, Marko, Jenny, Simon

GUI: Miri, Jenny

Character Art:  Miri

Sound: Sanny

3D Modelling: Ronja

Delivered good vibes: Hydra Bot
